general.fillAllFields: Ensure to fill all fields before proceeding
general.usernameBlank: We need your username to proceed

onboarding.description1: It is a documentation and collaboration platform for young creators
onboarding.description2: On Zubhub, you can get inspired by our collection of activity ideas, tinker with materials and tools around you, and share your creation with others
onboarding.description3: It is simple! Sign up to create an account on ZubHub. Upload a project when you feel ready by filling out a form. Explore projects from peers and leave feedback on their work in the form of comments.

login.loginSuccess: Your login was successful. Welcome onboard!

register.locationBlank: Looks like you forgot this! Where are you from?
register.emailOrTel: You must enter either an email or a phone number
register.accountCreationSuccess: Your account was successfully created. Welcome onboard!
